textContent:
We housed an accursed woman. She was cursed with the curse of spring. When the first butterfly emerged from hybernation and touched the ground, the curse would trigger.

And so it did. She crumbled into a pile of spores, filling the sky with an orange mist. Everyone around her became infected, extremely soft and vulnerable, and died almost instantly. Some tried to run away, but their legs could not support the weight of their bodies, and crumbled like sand.
title: Dream
textContentHtml:
We housed an accursed woman. She was cursed with the curse of spring. When the first butterfly emerged from hybernation and touched the ground, the curse would trigger.


And so it did. She crumbled into a pile of spores, filling the sky with an orange mist. Everyone around her became infected, extremely soft and vulnerable, and died almost instantly. Some tried to run away, but their legs could not support the weight of their bodies, and crumbled like sand.
